about_the_game:
Toucan Rampage: Sandstorm Shooter



Prepare for an intense aerial showdown in Toucan Rampage: Sandstorm Shooter! Take on the skies and defend yourself against a flock of attacking Toucans aiming to bomb you out of existence. It's a high-stakes battle where survival is your only option!

Gameplay Highlights:
- Skyward Showdown: Engage in a thrilling battle against swooping Toucans, the aerial assailants bent on your destruction.
- Shoot 'Em Down: Take aim and fire to bring down these avian foes before they overwhelm you with their bomb attacks.
- Power-Ups: Collect shields scattered amidst the chaos to protect yourself and scavenge downed Toucans for health to withstand the relentless onslaught.
- Fifteen Levels of Chaos: Face off against waves of Toucans across fifteen challenging levels, each demanding quick reflexes and precise shooting skills.
- Future Updates: Enjoy the promise of additional levels at no extra cost! Early purchasers can expect more thrilling challenges added in future updates, expanding the adrenaline-fueled action.

Key Features:
- Fast-Paced Action: Experience adrenaline-pumping, fast-paced shooting gameplay as you defend yourself against the Toucan onslaught.
- Survival Challenge: Test your reflexes and shooting accuracy in an intense battle for survival against relentless aerial attacks.
- Health and Shield Collection: Strategically collect shields for temporary protection and scavenge downed Toucans for health to stay in the fight.
- Immersive Experience: For an enhanced experience, Toucan Rampage: Sandstorm Shooter is configured to seamlessly integrate with Perspectacles head tracking glasses. Immerse yourself fully in the game as Perspectacles elevate the intensity of the aerial combat, offering an unparalleled level of immersion and control.

Jump into the chaos, blast your way through waves of Toucans, and survive the Sandstorm Shooter challenge! Purchase now and gain access to future updates with more levels and thrills at no extra cost.

*Note: Perspectacles head tracking glasses are recommended for an immersive experience but not required to play the game.*
detailed_description:
Enhanced for Perspectacles:

This game is optimized for Perspectacles, exclusive spatial tech glasses. While not required, they offer enhanced features.
To learn more or purchase Perspectacles, visit 3Di World.

name: Toucan Rampage: Sandstorm Shooter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Gear up for Toucan Rampage: Sandstorm Shooter! Face off against waves of bomb-dropping Toucans in fifteen challenging levels. Utilize strategic power-ups to survive the intense aerial showdown. Experience fast-paced action and stay tuned for free future updates, bringing more thrills to the chaos!
